name: NLOS Script
summary: Learn about .NBAS files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NLOS is a Python-based operating system that can be used to run .PY programs and NBAS scripts. To use NLOS, users download it, run it, create a user, and log in. They can then execute various commands, including the nbas command used to run NBAS scripts.

description: An NBAS file is a script used by NLOS, a simple operating system created by nate-4000. It contains commands that NLOS can execute.

instructions: You can open an NBAS file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform) or any other text editor, to view and edit the script it contains.
To run an NBAS file with NLOS, open the program, log in, and use the nbas command.
